main.name: MD. ABU MUSA
main.bio: My name is Musa, I'm a Full Stack ReactJS Developer. Currently I'm working as a freelancer and also looking for opportunity to join a team.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details.

resume.skillmessage: My specialties include quickly learning new skills and programming languages, problem solving, responsive design principles, and MVVM and MVC method of organizing code. So far I have C, C++, C#, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, jQuery, Bootstrap, ReactJS, AngularJS, PHP, Node.JS, Express.JS , MongoDB and Git/Github under my belt. I have developed several projects using these technologies and love working on different type of projects. I've started learning Amazon Web Services(AWS), Software testing and different type of project management software. I'm still enthusiastically grabbing onto any other programming languages, frameworks, or principles I can integrate into the coding web in my head.

education.degree: M.Sc. Engg. in Information and Communications Technology

education.description: Graduated with a CGPA 3.91 out of 4.00

testimonials.text: You made it so simple. My new site is so much faster and easier to work with than my old site. I just choose the page, make the change and click save.Thank You!
